description:
e107 CMS is in the Top 5 of Conten Management System in the world!
e107 is better than Wordpress because have many futures and plugins (default has almost 15 plugins are already included! Just one click to activate: the forum, Poll, chatbox, PDF, and more).
e107 is better than Joomla because it is much easier and the control panel is very intuitive!

DO YOU WANT LEARN e107 FROM SCRATCH?
Build Your Professional Website Easily?
With the Power of New Framework Bootstrap 3?

JOIN THIS COURSE and MAKE YOUR BEST ONLINE SITE !

The course includes FULL introductory lessons to e107. You learn the install setup (on web or on local), commands and techniques for Adding new posts and Pages, create Categories, Profile settings, use and install Plugins, changing template layouts, and more with e107, easy!

You will become familiar with the e107 interface, Adding pages to website, Adding news to the homepage, Managing menu, Processing comments, Plugins, Newsletter and Media: Making website live!
Introducing excellent, online e107 training that allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college.

The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace.

ARE YOU READY TO BUILD OWN WEBSITE NOW!!

The course package:
- 24 video tutorials (about 3.30 hours total)
- Great tutorials: step by step, how create a custom website
- Videos available, 24 hours on 24
- Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
- Build your first website!

The course outline:
- What Is e107?
- Installation on free hosting
- Using Custom Domain Name: URL
- The Dashboard
- Admin Profile
- Media Setup
- Add news to website
- Add Category
- Comments Options
- Menu Setting
- Menu
- Plugin
- Tools
- Header Options
- Changing Page Layout
- Adding Link To NavBar
- Adding Posts to the Homepage
- Themes
- Managing Users and Permissions
- Comments reviews
- and more.
title: Learn E107 From Scratch And Build Your Powerful Website
